name: Cristina Llamas Roman
title: FullStack Web Developer
short_bio: Freelance web developer with over 8 years of experience. Proven experience in both frontend and backend, knowledgeable in Drupal 7 & 8, Component based themeing with Patternlab and Twig, SASS,LESS, SMACSS. Worked with ReactJs and Riot in small to medium projects also using GraphQL.
